data.text: Single Speed for Bikepacking: Any Comments?

Any thoughts on bikepacking with a single speed? Considering getting the surly lowside. I love the idea of lower maintenance, fewer points of failure, and as someone that used to ride BMX, I find them more fun. I currently have the priority 600x pre-ordered, but considering making the switch. Thoughts? Not stressing, just opening up a conversation, and curious if others have used a single speed for this purpose and how they liked it.
I used a single speed for a long time and it worked out great for tarmac but a bit of a struggle with anything more taxing.
